SA11sanss14u:389: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt /
SA11sanss14u:391: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret /
SA11sanss14u:392: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanss14u:397: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nôpalabhyate /
SA11sanss14u:404: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate /
SA11sanss14u:408: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:413: mukto mocayeyam āśvastâśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti /
SA11sanss14u:414: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate 'iśvaryâdhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ /
SA11sanss14u:419: atrânantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛtâivaṃ paṭhyate /
SA11sanss14u:420: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati /
SA11sanss14u:423: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam anantayaśasaṃ tathâvasīdantaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:429_2: hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvôpakaraṇavarṣaṃ cânubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā
SA11sanss14u:429_3: śakrasyârdhâsanam ākramyātîcchayā na mukto 'tṛptâiva kāmaiḥ kālagatêti /
SA11sanss14u:430: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryêty evam uktvā ca rājânantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt /
SA11sanss14u:434: smāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyate /
SA11sanss14u:435: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyatae ity ādi //
SA11sanss14u:439: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:444: anājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nâlābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nâyaśaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:458: katamâiṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanss14u:459: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanâho śvit saṃjñôtâho saṃskārâtha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti /
SA11sanss14u:461: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanss14u:467: tad evam anupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:471: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ //
SA11sanss14u:478: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir anantakoṭir anāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi //
SA11sanss14u:483: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcânantaryāṇi /
SA11sanss14u:485: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:492: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nôpalabhāmahe /
SA11sanss14u:495: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate /
SA11sanss14u:496: koṭim api sa tasyôpalabhate dvaye câsau caratîti //
SA11sanss14u:498: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhâbhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:499: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathâiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:501: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:502: na ca vacana câsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti //
SA11sanss14u:503: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na câsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:504: tathêmi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:506: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:507: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:508: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam /
SA11sanss14u:509: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:510: yatha naru ihêndrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam /
SA11sanss14u:511: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:512: puravara yathâṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham /
SA11sanss14u:513: yatha nagara tathâṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:514: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā /
SA11sanss14u:515: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:519: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nâpi snehadhātuḥ /
SA11sanss14u:520: vimṛśatu bherîva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:521: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam /
SA11sanss14u:524: tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:525: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nâpi sa svatantraḥ /
SA11sanss14u:526: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:529: satvaś câsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat /
SA11sanss14u:531: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjâriham //
SA11sanss14u:532: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [[DOUBT]] daśaddiśigataṃ nâivaṃ parīdṛśyate /
SA11sanss14u:534: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devâtideva tvayā /
SA11sanss14u:535: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ /
SA11sanss14u:536: tena tvāṃ dvipadôttamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjâriham //
SA11sanss14u:537: satvānâiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyâpanītaṃ dukhaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:538: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair nôditāḥ //
SA11sanss14u:540: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ //
SA11sanss14u:542: nâivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā nâiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ //
SA11sanss14u:543: uktaṃ cô sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ /
SA11sanss14u:544: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ //
SA11sanss14u:545: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye /
SA11sanss14u:547: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate //
SA11sanss14u:548: śamathaś câtha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune /
SA11sanss14u:549: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:553: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:554: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa nôtpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanss14u:556: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nôpalabhyate na tac cakṣur nêndriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:558: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ nô tu khalu paramâ-
SA11sanss14u:561: evaṃ cakṣuś cêndriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālôpalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram //
SA11sanss14u:565: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:567: atrâiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
SA11sanss14u:570: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenâsya vyākaraṇam //
SA11sanss14u:577: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibi-
SA11sanss14u:581: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumâṅgaśo vicārayasi /
SA11sanss14u:584: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ /
SA11sanss14u:585: śakaṭâṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya câiva kriyāṃ //
SA11sanss14u:586: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu /
SA11sanss14u:587: vātêritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ //
SA11sanss14u:588: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutâśanaṃ ca yajane /
SA11sanss14u:589: na nivartate vahnis tathâiva karmasya kartāraḥ //
SA11sanss14u:590: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate /
SA11sanss14u:593: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin /
SA11sanss14u:597: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharmôtpadyate utânutpannaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:605: sā ca śūnyatā nôtpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanss14u:607: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyôktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā nôtpatsyante na nirotsyante /
SA11sanss14u:610: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathâbhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā nôtpadyante na nirudhyante /
SA11sanss14u:613: saṃskṛtā dharmôtpadyante nirudhyante cêty asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:616: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyôttrāsapadaparihārârthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante cêti /
SA11sanss14u:617: na câtra kasyacid dharmasyôtpādo na nirodhêti //
SA11sanss14u:619: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ /
SA11sanss14u:627: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati /
SA11sanss14u:629: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ parasparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti /
SA11sanss14u:635: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti nâite kasyacit /
SA11sanss14u:637: nâite bhagavan dharmôdvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante /
SA11sanss14u:638: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye /
SA11sanss14u:641: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmîti /
SA11sanss14u:643: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss14u:645: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati /
SA11sanss14u:646: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratîti /
SA11sanss14u:652: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti //
SA11sanss14u:656: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramârthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād /
SA11sanss14u:668: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmêti //
SA11sanss14u:679: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate /
SA11sanss14u:680: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti //
SA11sanss14u:681: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:682: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte /
SA11sanss14u:684_0: nâsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nâsau śūnyatāṃ
SA11sanss14u:684_1: jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam
SA11sanss14u:688: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrâvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra
SA11sanss14u:692: sā câitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmâvajñā câivaṃ bhāvanīyā //
SA11sanss14u:693: yadi satvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā /
SA11sanss14u:694: ekasya hi parâtmatvaṃ viruddhaṃ saṃbhavet kathaṃ //
SA11sanss14u:695: vinâlambanam apy etad ācaranty eva dehinaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:700: na tu me gauravāt saukhyam ihâpi janadurbhagāt //
SA11sanss14u:706: śabdas tāvad acittatvān māṃ stautîti na saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11sanss14u:707: paraḥ kila mayi prītêty ayaṃ me matibhramaḥ //
SA11sanss14u:708: tattuṣṭyâiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadā astu sā /
SA11sanss14u:709: tatsukhena na cet kāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama //
SA11sanss14u:710: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
SA11sanss14u:711: na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyam ihâṇv api //
SA11sanss14u:714: na dharmo nâyur ārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanâdibhiḥ /
SA11sanss14u:729: haren muniḥ // sādṛśyād anyad apy etad vārisrotovad īkṣyate /
SA11sanss14u:730: tad evêdam iti bhrāntyā tatve tiṣṭhāmy ato balāt //
SA11sanss14u:731: avastu câitat sādṛśyaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca janayiṣyati /
SA11sanss14u:732: ahaṃ câitac ca sarvaṃ ca na cirān na bhaviṣyati /
